job.title: Embedded Software Engineer
job.industry: Electrical/Electronic Manufacturing,Information Technology and Services,Staffing and Recruiting
job.description: stronguOverviewbrbrustrongCombine your love of SW Development and AudioVideobrbrQSC seeks an experience and selfmotivated Software Engineer to work with an experienced team of software engineers and product management to develop cuttingedge digital audio productsbrbrQSC thrives where innovative technology and compelling audiovisual experiences intersect For over 50 years QSC has pioneered the technology and solutions that enable immersive cinema live performance audio themed entertainment digital collaboration and meeting experiences for our customers and partners around the world A globally recognized innovator in the design engineering and manufacture of category leading highperformance loudspeakers digital mixers power amplifiers audio processors digital cinema solutions and the QSYS softwarebased audio video and control EcosystembrbrBy joining the QSC team you will be in a challenging collaborative fun and innovative environment We encourage employees to take ownership to color outside the lines and to imagine possibilities Our culture is casual but dynamic with crossfunctional teams collaborating on creating memorable audiovisual experiences that deliver joy to people wherever they are At QSC fun and hard work go hand in hand Join us and make a difference in the way people experience movies meetings presentations live performances and much morebrbrThis position is located in Costa Mesa CaliforniabrbrstronguResponsibilitiesbrustrongulli Work collaboratively with other members of a tightknit small project team to develop worldclass professional audiovideo products for the live sound cinema and systems markets lili Develop solutions for a networked system of embedded devices lili Apply good software design and development practices in daily activities lili Work with Software Quality Assurance to develop appropriate test strategies brliulstronguQualificationsbrustrongulli BS or MS in Electrical Engineering Computer Science or related field from an accredited university lili Minimum 3 years of work experience as an embedded software engineer working in large code bases lili Strong coding skills in CC lili Experience with Linux development including Linux driver development lili Experience with C and VisualStudio lili Experience with SPI I2C TDM I2S and parallel interfaces lili Outstanding problem solving skills lili Excellent written and verbal communication skills brliulstrongExperience in any of the following areas is a plusbrstrongulli Analog Devices DSPs including Sigma and Sharc processors lili Audio DSP algorithms including IIR and FIR filters as well as dynamics processing lili Audio power amplifiers lili Circuits analog filters and power electronics lili Embedded Linux FreeRTOS or other real time operating systems on ARM processors lili Professional audiovideo products and systemsliul
